title: An Apple Original Programming Push Could Spell Trouble For Netflix, Amazon - newsR
text: In rather unsurprising news, it looks as though Apple is one step closer to its determined quest to dominate the global media landscape: Variety's Andrew Wallenstein reports that the technology giant is preparing to make its original programming aspirations a reality. Â»
